Name: PewPew Live
About the game: PewPew Live is a twin-stick shooter with retro vector graphics where you compete for the best scores . Emphasis is put on the speed and diversity of the gameplay. Comes with 5 different built-in levels, and a ton of levels (50+) created by other players ! Online leaderboards, with replays of every games. Retro-futurist vector graphics. Unlockable ships, bullets and trails. 2 player co-op: online or over LAN.
